ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned vocab and grammatical structure as typical in a language class, but unique to this class was learning about how to communicate in style and more like a native speaker in tonality and construction of language. We also actually played Indonesian music, sports, and tried classic dishes which was also new.
I learned alot about Indonesian culture and language and was able to apply my skills to real life scenarios. I developed my writing and speaking skills.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: weakness is just the last minute emails

I think the course is overall in good shape - assignments make sense for what we're learning, class is helpful and Bu Dinny writes a lot on the board which was very helpful notes. Only critique is that a decent number of homeworks were announced pretty late over email with tight turnarounds, and some homework assignments were pretty long (couple hours) for a 1 day assignment. I think if that same assignment was given 2 or 3 days to do and announced far enough in advance it would work very well.

Strengths: very engaging with a down to earth professor and simple homeworks made to hit specific topixs that need more work.

Weakness: canvas system could be better organized, wasnt sure when exams would be and how big of a percentage it was.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, it was a lot of fun

Yes - but don't go into the class expecting an easy A. You'll have a solid amount of assignments and class participation is expected every day. But if you put in effort Bu Dinny will absolutely work with you to help you succeed.
Yes! This class is fun and engaging and Bu Dinny is incredible! Take this class if you can!!
